Articles.Content:
Figured I'd start a thread for my myriad Kerbal doodles. Feedback and criticism are of course welcome.

To begin...

My latest diabolical creation:
Absolutely brilliant.
Wow this is great! Represents everything I do in KSP perfectly.
I couldn't stop laughing when I saw this. Great work as usual.
That's awesome man, the animation is stellar.
It's so awesome!!

Long ago, when krakens still roamed the solar system, there were several debates as to whether or not to have female Kerbals included in the game. I generally fell on the side of "yes", but after several threads were locked, the community decided to handwave around the issue and say that Kerbals just didn't have genders.

I'm OK with that.

I realized, however, that without seeing any serious attempts to design a female Kerbal (the few comics in which they're featured focus on characterization and don't strictly follow the "Squad style"), the community was basically arguing in the dark.

So I decided that, since I'm the only one I trust to do so, I'd design a female Kerbal for realz.

Here is a side-by-side comparison of a male and female Kerbal, Pioneer Plaque-style.

They're both naked.

DON'T PANIC

I promise you won't go blind.

(They're both bald for the purposes of the exercise, but I drew their hairlines for comparison.)

hell yeah !
